ProtaBattleString.string: You fire a quick shot at the enemy. It grazes them.
You take a second to aim at the enemy. You fire. The shot connects.

RoxyBattleString.string: Roxy springs forward, kicks the enemy in the gut, and bounces back.
Roxy bounces high into the air. Her metal heels come crashing down on the enemy's head.
Roxy pushes her palm to the enemy's chest and looses an electric shock.

SmittyBattleString.string: Smitty quickly sweeps under the enemy with his hammer. They trip and fall.
Smitty clips the ground with his hammer, flinging a light field of rubble at the enemy.
Smitty slams the ground, causing a fissure to open up under the enemy.

room.name: FirstSteps
room.des: The Plains. Rolling fields of green stretch as far as the eye can see. A slight breeze makes the grass seam as if it were alive.

room.name: TheDesert
room.des: The Desert. Nothing. That's all there is other than the endless sand that is. It's impressive to think that there are some creatures that can survive out here.

room.name: TheForest
room.des: Trees. Trees taller than you can see. Sometimes you like to wonder about all of the creatures that might live up in the tops of these trees.

room.name: TheShore
room.des: The white sands are always beautiful but the sudden drop into the vast nothingness beoynd still manages to evoke a bit of fear deep in your heart.
